body.p:
Covington Ky
May 6th 1862
His Excellency
Beriah Magoffin,
Sir,

You will see from the enclosed that Mr P. J. Donham of Ohio wishes to be appointed Commissioner. You will please send him a commission and he will send such fees as the Sec of State is entitled to receive.
I know him well. He is a gentleman -- national in his sentiments, and for several years has been in the habit of practising law in Ky --

Ohio
P. J Donham
(Cov)
(New Richmond)
Comd May 7. 1862
